ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages beef flavored ramen noodles
instructions: Brown meat in a large skillet. Drain off fat, and rinse meat using a colander.
Transfer meat to a large cooking pot. Stir in onion, garlic, and ginger. Add water, and bring soup to a boil. Stir in bok choy. Reduce heat ,and simmer for about 3 minutes.
Stir in noodles. Simmer 3 minutes longer, or until bok choy and onions are crisp tender and noodles are soft. Stir in seasoning packets, oil, and soy sauce.
title: Quick Asian Beef Noodle Soup
sentences: Brown meat in a large skillet.
Drain off fat, and rinse meat using a colander.
Transfer meat to a large cooking pot.
Stir in onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add water, and bring soup to a boil.
Reduce heat ,and simmer for about 3 minutes.
Simmer 3 minutes longer, or until bok choy and onions are crisp tender and noodles are soft.
Stir in seasoning packets, oil, and soy sauce.
